scripts.run:dev: yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate && yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all && SET NODE_ENV=development && nodemon index.js
scripts.run:prod: yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production && yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all --mode production && SET NODE_ENV=production && node index.js
scripts.start: yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate  && yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all  && SET NODE_ENV=production && node index.js
